input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product name.

Product name:
Amzer 10.5-Inch Designer Neoprene Sleeve Case Pouch for Tablet, eBook and Netbook - Coffee Break (AMZ5008105)

Product keywords:
Constructed of shock-absorbing & weather resistant neoprene material.
Secure your tablet or e-reader up to 10.5 inches.
Non-abrasive material lines interior securing your device for safe travel and storage.
Slim and lightweight design provides low-profile protection against everyday wear and tear.
Stylish exterior graphic.
Dual zippers makes accessing your device quick and easy.
External Dimensions: 11.125 x 8.5. Internal Dimensions: 10.5 x 8.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Amzer 10.5-Inch Designer Neoprene Sleeve Case Pouch for Tablet, eBook and Netbook - Coffee Break (AMZ5008105) is designed to protect your device from tear, damage, and scratches while providing easy access to all buttons, ports, and cameras of your tablet or e-reader. The stylish exterior graphic is durable and dirt-resistant, making it perfect for everyday use. The non-abrasive material lines the interior, securing your device for safe travel and storage. The slim and lightweight design provides low-profile protection against everyday wear and tear. Dual zippers make accessing your device quick and easy. external Dimensions: 11.125 x 8.5. Internal Dimensions: 10.5 x 8.
input_text.Response B: The Amzer 10.5-Inch Designer Neoprene Sleeve Case Pouch protects your tablet, eBook or netbook while on the go. The neoprene construction is both weather and shock resistant to protect your device from the elements and accidental bumps and drops while the non-abrasive interior lining keeps your device safe from scratches. The slim profile makes this sleeve ideal for travel or storage and the stylish exterior adds a flair to your everyday case.
